text: The Vice President of Brazil (), officially the Vice President of the Federative Republic of Brazil (Vice Presidente da República Federativa do Brasil) is the second-highest government official in the executive branch of the government of Brazil. ==Roles== The Vice President's main job is to replace the president on the event of their death, resignation, or impeachment, and to temporarily take over the presidential powers and duties while the President is abroad, or unable to carry out his or her duties. The Vice President is elected with the president as his or her running mate. ==Living former Vice Presidents== There are two living former vice presidents.
